name: Threat Assessment: Identity app
author: Joe Smith
desc: Scope is limited to the SPA running in the browser and receiving strings from the translation service

name: Threat Assessment: Translation String
author: Ben Barnes
desc: Translation strings are pulled in at run-time on CDH instead of at build time
usecases: We need to translate the SPA into many languages, using existing functionality in CDH (run-time)

name: Threat Assessment: Convention Information - Person lookup by JWPub username
author: Placide, Julie-Am√©line
desc: This is to examine more specifically the risk of allowing convention committee members to lookup persons by JWPub username
usecases: Convention Committee Member enters the JWPub username to lookup the record of the already-appointed person
whatwrongs: Grant access to an unauthorized person to Convention domain, event media, etc (not specific to JWPub username).
